00026 struct {
00027   BOOL enabled;
00028   BOOL synchronous;
00029   BOOL participating;
00030   BOOL ready[3]; // index indicates RAM cycle (index 0 not used) 
00031   HNDLE conn;
00032 } crate[MAX_CRATES];
00033 
00034 INT event_number;
00035 INT request_stop_event;
00036 static BOOL enable_rpc_master;
00037 
00038 struct readout_module rpc_master_module = {
00039   rpc_master_init,        // init
00040   NULL,                   // exit

00051 /*
00052  * rpc_master_init
00053  *
00054  */
00055 INT rpc_master_init()
00056 {
00057   // Determine whether we ought to be the master
00058   enable_rpc_master = 
00059     odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/Master", crate_number);
00060   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00061     return SUCCESS;
00062   }
00063 
00064   // register the RPC function that we provide
00065   rpc_register_functions(rpc_list_mucap, NULL);
00066   rpc_register_function(RPC_READY_FOR_CYCLE, rpc_ready_for_cycle);
00067   rpc_register_function(RPC_REQUEST_STOP, rpc_request_stop);
00068 
00069   return SUCCESS;
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*
00073  * rpc_master_pre_bor()
00074  */
00075 INT rpc_master_pre_bor()
00076 {
00077   diag_print(1, "Clearing crate ready flags\n");
00078 
00079   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00080     for(int j = 0; j <= 2; j++) {
00081       crate[i].ready[j] = FALSE;
00082     }
00083   }
00084 
00085   return SUCCESS;
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*
00089  * rpc_master_bor()
00090  */
00091 INT rpc_master_bor()
00092 {
00093   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00094     return SUCCESS;
00095   }
00096 
00097   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00098     if(i != crate_number) {
00099       bool enabled = false;
00100       if(odb_find_key("/Equipment/Crate %d", i) != NULL) {
00101         enabled = odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/Enabled", i);
00102       }
00103       crate[i].enabled = enabled;
00104 
00105 
00106       if(enabled) { 
00107         crate[i].synchronous = 
00108           odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/Synchronous", i);
00109 
00110         char crate_label[10];
00111         sprintf(crate_label, "Crate %d", i);
00112         cm_connect_client(crate_label, &crate[i].conn);
00113         rpc_set_option(crate[i].conn, RPC_OTRANSPORT, RPC_FTCP);
00114         rpc_set_option(crate[i].conn, RPC_NODELAY, TRUE);
00115       }
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119   event_number = 1;
00120   request_stop_event = 0;
00121 
00122   return SUCCESS;
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*
00126  *
00127  */
00128 INT rpc_master_eor()
00129 {
00130   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00131     return SUCCESS;
00132   }
00133 
00134   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00135     if(i != crate_number && crate[i].enabled) {
00136       cm_disconnect_client(crate[i].conn, 0);
00137     }
00138   }
00139 
00140   return SUCCESS;
00141 }

00144  *
00145  */
00146 INT rpc_ready_for_cycle(INT index, void *prpc_param[])
00147 {
00148   INT crate_number = CINT(0);
00149   INT ram_cycle = CINT(1);
00150 
00151   diag_print(2, "Crate %d is ready for a new cycle on ram=%d.\n",
00152              crate_number, ram_cycle);
00153 
00154   crate[crate_number].ready[ram_cycle] = TRUE;
00155 
00156 #if 0
00157   if(ram_cycle == 0) {
00158     crate[crate_number].ready[1] = crate[crate_number].ready[2] = TRUE;
00159   } else {
00160     crate[crate_number].ready[ram_cycle] = TRUE;
00161   }
00162 #endif
00163 
00164   return SUCCESS;
00165 }
00166 
00167 /*
00168  *
00169  */
00170 INT rpc_request_stop(INT index, void *prpc_param[])
00171 {
00172   INT crate_number = CINT(0);
00173   INT event_number_in = CINT(1);
00174 
00175   diag_print(2, "Crate %d requests end of block %d\n", 
00176              crate_number, event_number_in);
00177 
00178   if(event_number_in != event_number) {
00179     diag_print(0, 
00180       "Crate %d requests end of block %d--not the right event number (%d)\n", 
00181        crate_number, event_number_in, event_number);
00182     return SUCCESS;
00183   }
00184 
00185   request_stop_event = event_number_in;
00186 
00187   return SUCCESS;
00188 }
00189 
00190 /*
00191  * Returns whether a particular crate is participating in this cycle.
00192  */
00193 BOOL crate_is_participating(INT crate_number)
00194 {
00195   return crate[crate_number].participating;
00196 }
00197 
00198 /*
00199  * Returns the TDC400 RAM number (1 or 2) associated with the current 
00200  * event number.
00201  */
00202 INT cycle_ram()
00203 {
00204   return ((event_number + 1) % 2) + 1; 
00205 }
00206 
00207 INT rpc_master_read(char *pevent)
00208 {
00209   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00210     return SUCCESS;
00211   }
00212 
00213   int ram = cycle_ram();
00214 
00215   // Send a message to other crates that the cycle is now over
00216   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00217     if(i != crate_number && crate[i].enabled) {
00218       if(crate[i].synchronous || crate[i].participating) {
00219         diag_print(2, "Sending RPC_END_OF_CYCLE to crate %d RAM %d event %d\n",
00220             i, ram, event_number);
00221         rpc_client_call(crate[i].conn, RPC_END_OF_CYCLE, ram, event_number);
00222       }
00223     }
00224    }
00225  
00226   // Increment event number
00227   event_number++;
00228 
00229   return SUCCESS;
00230 }
00231 
00232 INT rpc_master_poll_live()
00233 {
00234   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00235     return SUCCESS;
00236   }
00237 
00238   // Yield to receive any pending RPCs
00239   cm_yield(0);
00240 
00241   // Have we received a request to end the event?
00242   if(request_stop_event == event_number) {
00243     diag_print(2, "Stopping event.\n");
00244     return FE_NEED_STOP; 
00245   } 
00246 
00247   return SUCCESS;
00248 }
00249 
00250 INT rpc_master_poll_dead()
00251 {
00252   if(!enable_rpc_master) {
00253     return SUCCESS;
00254   }
00255 
00256   // Yield to receive any pending RPCs
00257   cm_yield(0);
00258 
00259   // Have we received notice from each of the enabled crates that
00260   // it is ready to start? 
00261 
00262   BOOL ready_to_start = TRUE;
00263 
00264   INT ram = cycle_ram(); 
00265 
00266   for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00267     if(i != crate_number && crate[i].enabled && crate[i].synchronous && 
00268        !(crate[i].ready[ram] || crate[i].ready[0])) {
00269       ready_to_start = FALSE; 
00270       break;
00271     }
00272   }
00273 
00274   if(ready_to_start) {
00275     for(int i = 0; i < MAX_CRATES; i++) {
00276       crate[i].participating = (crate[i].ready[ram] || crate[i].ready[0]);
00277 
00278       crate[i].ready[ram] = FALSE;
00279       crate[i].ready[0] = FALSE;
00280     }
00281 
00282     return FE_NEED_START;
00283   } else {
00284     return SUCCESS;
00285   }
00286 }
